017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.util.Collection;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.Objects;
022
023import org.microbean.development.annotation.OverridingEncouraged;
024
025/**
026 * An interface whose implementations skeletally represent a Java
027 * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Type type} or a Java {@linkplain
028 * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} for equality comparison
029 * purposes and no other.
030 *
031 * @param <T> the type describing the type representation type; often
032 * {@link java.lang.reflect.Type}, {@link
033 * java.lang.reflect.Constructor}, {@link
034 * java.lang.reflect.Executable} or {@link java.lang.reflect.Method}
035 *
036 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
037 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
038 */
039public interface Owner<T> {
040
041  /**
042   * Returns the {@link Owner} of this {@link Owner}, or {@code null}
043   * if there is no such {@link Owner}.
044   *
045   * @return the {@link Owner} of this {@link Owner}, or {@code null}
046   *
047   * @nullability Implementations of this method may, and often will,
048   * return {@code null}.
049   *
050   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
051   * and deterministic.
052   *
053   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
054   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
055   */
056  public Owner<T> owner();
057
058  /**
059   * Returns the object this {@link Owner} is modeling, or {@code
060   * null} if that information is not supplied by the implementation.
061   *
062   * <p><strong>The default implementation of this method returns
063   * {@code null}.</strong> {@linkplain OverridingEncouraged
064   * Overriding is encouraged}.</p>
065   *
066   * @return the object this {@link Owner} is modeling, or {@code
067   * null} if that information is not supplied by the implementation
068   *
069   * @nullability Implementations of this method may return {@code
070   * null}.
071   *
072   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
073   * and deterministic.
074   *
075   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
076   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
077   */
078  @OverridingEncouraged
079  public default Object object() {
080    return null;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
085   * either a Java type that has a name, or an {@linkplain
086   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable}.
087   *
088   * <p>In the Java reflective type system, only {@link Class}, {@link
089   * java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable}, and {@link
090   * java.lang.reflect.Executable} instances have names.</p>
091   *
092   * <p>The default implementation of this method returns {@code true}
093   * if and only if an invocation of the {@link #name()} method
094   * returns a non-{@code null} value.</p>
095   *
096   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
097   * either a Java type that has a name, or an {@linkplain
098   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable}
099   *
100   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
101   * and deterministic.
102   *
103   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
104   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
105   *
106   * @see #name()
107   *
108   * @see Class#getName()
109   *
110   * @see java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable#getName()
111   */
112  public default boolean named() {
113    return this.name() != null;
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Returns the name of this {@link Owner} if it has one <strong>or
118   * {@code null} if it does not</strong>.
119   *
120   * <p>Only classes (including interfaces) and type variables in the
121   * Java reflective type system have names.  {@linkplain
122   * java.lang.reflect.Executable Owners representing executables} do
123   * too.</p>
124   *
125   * @return the name of this {@link Owner}, or {@code null}
126   *
127   * @nullability Implementations of this method may, and often will,
128   * return {@code null}.
129   *
130   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
131   * and deterministic.
132   *
133   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
134   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
135   */
136  public String name();
137
138  /**
139   * If this {@link Owner} represents a parameterized type or a
140   * generic array type, returns a {@link Type} representing its raw
141   * type or generic component type, or, if this {@link Owner}
142   * represents an {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Constructor
143   * constructor}, returns a {@link Type} representing {@code void} or
144   * {@link Void}, or, if this {@link Owner} represents a {@linkplain
145   * java.lang.reflect.Method method}, returns a {@link Type}
146   * representing its {@linkplain
147   * java.lang.reflect.Method#getGenericReturnType() generic return
148   * type}, or returns {@code this} (the {@link Owner} in this case
149   * will be known to be a {@link Type}).
150   *
151   * <p>Undefined behavior will result if an implementation does not
152   * meet these requirements.</p>
153   *
154   * @return a suitable {@link Type}; never {@code null}; often {@code
155   * this}
156   *
157   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return
158   * {@code null}.
159   *
160   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
161   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
162   *
163   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
164   * and deterministic.
165   */
166  public Type<T> type();
167
168  /**
169   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
170   * an {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} by virtue
171   * of having parameters.
172   *
173   * <p>The default implementation of this method calls the {@link
174   * #parameters()} method and returns {@code true} if the resulting
175   * {@link List} is not {@code null}.</p>
176   *
177   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
178   * an {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} by virtue
179   * of having parameters
180   *
181   * @see #parameters()
182   */
183  public default boolean hasParameters() {
184    return this.parameters() != null;
185  }
186
187  /**
188   * Returns an {@linkplain
189   * java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList(List) unmodifiable
190   * <code>List</code>} of this {@link Owner}'s parameters, if this
191   * {@link Owner} represents an {@linkplain
192   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable}, or {@code null} if it
193   * does not.
194   *
195   * @return an {@linkplain
196   * java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList(List) unmodifiable
197   * <code>List</code>} of this {@link Owner}'s parameters, if this
198   * {@link Owner} represents an {@linkplain
199   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable}, or {@code null} if it
200   * does not
201   *
202   * @nullability Implementations of this method may, and often will,
203   * return {@code null}.
204   *
205   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
206   * and deterministic.
207   *
208   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
209   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
210   */
211  public List<? extends Type<T>> parameters();
212
213  /**
214   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
215   * a generic class or a generic {@linkplain
216   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} by virtue of having type
217   * parameters.
218   *
219   * <p>This implementation calls the {@link #typeParameters()} method
220   * and returns {@code true} if the resulting {@link List} is
221   * {@linkplain List#isEmpty() not empty}.</p>
222   *
223   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
224   * a generic class or a generic {@linkplain
225   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} by virtue of having type
226   * parameters
227   *
228   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
229   * and deterministic.
230   *
231   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
232   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
233   *
234   * @see #typeParameters()
235   */
236  @OverridingEncouraged
237  public default boolean hasTypeParameters() {
238    return !this.typeParameters().isEmpty();
239  }
240
241  /**
242   * Returns an {@linkplain
243   * java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList(List) unmodifiable
244   * <code>List</code>} of this {@link Owner}'s type parameters.
245   *
246   * <p>The returned {@link List} will be {@linkplain List#isEmpty()
247   * non-empty} if and only if this {@link Type} models a generic
248   * class or a generic {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Executable
249   * executable}.</p>
250   *
251   * <p>Undefined behavior will result if an implementation does not
252   * meet these requirements.</p>
253   *
254   * @return an {@linkplain
255   * java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList(List) unmodifiable
256   * <code>List</code>} of this {@link Type}'s type parameters; never
257   * {@code null}
258   *
259   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return
260   * {@code null}.
261   *
262   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
263   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
264   *
265   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
266   * and deterministic.
267   */
268  public List<? extends Type<T>> typeParameters();
269
270  /**
271   * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Object}
272   * is equal in some way to this {@link Owner}'s {@linkplain
273   * #object() object}.
274   *
275   * <p>The default implementation of this method invokes {@link
276   * Objects#equals(Object, Object)} with the return value of an
277   * invocation of the {@link #object()} method and the supplied
278   * {@code object} and returns the result.</p>
279   *
280   * @param object the object to test; may be {@code null}
281   *
282   * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Object}
283   * is equal in some way to this {@link Owner}'s {@linkplain
284   * #object() object}
285   *
286   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
287   * idempotent and deterministic.
288   *
289   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
290   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
291   *
292   * @see #object()
293   */
294  public default boolean objectEquals(final Object object) {
295    return Objects.equals(this.object(), object);
296  }
297
298}
